channel.title: Please help me with this error ;)
channel.description:
hi,
i keep getting this error when i open runserver.bat (using cheezscape source) :(
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server[/code] :confused:
anybody know a solution, i've been trying for days to fix it but no luck :( compile.bat works fine btw.
ty :D
Edit: ok... i've uninstalled every single bit of java on my pc and install jdk1.5.0_09 which also installed the jre... No luck :( i think my classpaths a set correctly...
Whoever helps me get rid of this error gets rep++

item.title: Please help me with this error ;)
item.dc:creator: @mr.prawn mr.prawn
item.description:
@mr.prawn wrote:

k… i right clicked and edited i says

@echo off title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

I still dont understand yes i am a n00b[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 05:00:07 AM[/size][hr]anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 05:35:56 AM[/size][hr]ok… somebody?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 05:48:19 AM[/size][hr]Please please please help other wise i cant get my server up and running

Read full topic

ok i can fix this problem right click run and hit edit find somin similar to this

java -Xmx500m client

but copy and paste this 1 over yours and save and compile and it should work

item.description:
@monsha wrote:

[quote=“brent3412, post:4, topic:18258”]go to my comp.
properties
advanced
set path[/quote]
if that dont work set the paths in your compiler / runserver.bat to your apropriate path of java and version.
